column4: Hey  guys I'm sorry but it looks like I'm in a difficult spot... when I boot into Ubuntu, i'm taken to the CLI. GDM says it's already running, but in F8 all I see is a blinking cursor
I'm not sure what to do from here
what should I do to find out why my GUI isn't working?
what seems to be the problem ?
when I boot up, I get the CLI instead of gnome. GDM says it's running, so I don't know what to do from here
I've tried f7 and f8 -- f7 just has boot messages
f8 has a blinking cursor -- i'm in f1 now
and what video card u have ?
hm interesting and it worked before or its a fresh install ?
it's worked before -- I did just change the gfx card though
do you think that's what happened?
ok i see, maybe u should try to reconfure Xserver ?
alright, i'll give that a shot
